Text: "Changed" the world? Didn't sex MAKE the world?
you know there was a sexual revolution in america right

According to a Linkedin profile that claims to be an Executive Producer at Asylum Entertainment, the description for the show would be “Sex has changed history in more ways than you can imagine. And we’re not just talking baby-making – this ten hour series reveals the amazing, shocking and 100% true story behind how sex has shaped history. From Ancient Greece to modern day, sex has impacted the way we govern, innovate, learn, and do just about everything else. Join us as we zig-zag through history, cutting straight to the good stuff – stories you won’t find in textbooks, about HOW SEX CHANGED THE WORLD.”
show is good, but i dont like the humungous text the show every 30 secs
